dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1974
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Writes of beauty in nature and the strange beauty of suffering, their difficulties with city planners, Peter Maurin and Ralph Borsodi on economics, and the importance of "abiding joy" and the "primacy of the spiritual" in the face of national crisis.
